```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

NB: control $\equiv$ command on Mac.

shortcut | description
-|-
alt + shift + k | see keyboard shortcuts
control + shift + k | knit
control + 3 | switch focus to Help pane
control + shift + M | pipe ` %>% `
control + enter | run this line of code
control + 2 | switch focus to Console pane
control + 1 | switch focus to Source pane
alt + shift + T | switch focus to Terminal pane
